column4: Hello all if I download and install Hardy beta, when the final version comes out should I download it again or can I do an upgrade?
if you install beta, and keep updating, you'll get to final when it comes out
Madpilot, thanks.  Usuall will the update be big? I mean the size I have to download again.
shouldn't be. You'll have a LOT of daily updates between now and release, though.
